humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions 'Tumor size: 2.1cm' under the synoptic report section. Based on the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is determined by the size of the largest tumor found in the breast. In this report, the largest focus of invasive ductal carcinoma measures 2.1 cm, which falls in the T2 category (tumor size 2.1-5 cm). Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T2.
